item.title: Comment on Schengen eroding, child legal arbitrage markets in everything by Phil S.
item.description:

item.title: Comment on I think crypto performed well in the Monday pseudo-crash by Florian
item.description:
What we have learned by now is that Bitcoin is rather strongly correlated with the stock market and the bond market.
This means that Bitcoin is NOT a good hedge against real world problems (as it is sometimes portrayed).

Comment URL: https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/08/i-think-crypto-performed-well-in-the-monday-pseudo-crash.html?commentID=160794614
